ShortDescriptions.ShortDescription: The L' ISARD HOTEL extends a warm welcome to ski-lovers. A comfortable establishment that has been adapted to the demands of mountain life. Of particular note are the panoramic views of the mountain. It's61 rooms offer customers a functional and pleasant environment. For families with children, the hotel is able to meet the needs of the very young.

The rooms have Independent Air Conditioning, Independent Heating, Telephone, TV, Central Air Conditioning, Central Heating, Plasma TV , Hairdryer, Bathtub, Laundry Service and Wi-Fi , and among our services and facilities available we have Air Conditioning, Lifts, Heating, Smoking Area, Cot, High Chair, Games Room and Bar Cafeteria. We also have Multilingual Personnel, Airport Shuttle , Ski Room, Use of Plug Adapters, Wi-Fi, Internet Corner, Safe in Reception, Airport Transfer and Garage. ...
